Quickstrike:






Quickstrike's spark raced as he saw the figure of the dragon outside the 
base. He gasped, and screamed. His mind was fulled with the memories of 
Megatron becoming the dragon, the incident that could have killed him. He 
remembered his trial.

"AUTO-GUNS, FIRE!" he screamed.

The auto-guns turned and fired at the dragon.

This was no good. Why couldn't things go right? He was hungry, hurt, 
and---actually scared. He needed to continue fixing the comuter to the 
Darkside's programing. Hell Beast had messed with it's programing when he 
was chased out.

With his spark still pulsing hard with his memories, he said to the 
computer, "Computer, bring back programin' bah unit Quickstrike. Bring back 
commands an' reformating of th' Darkside." He thought to himself, you are 
the Darkside now.
